attributes.action: Help Teenage Hackers Put There Skills To Good Uses!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are probabally at least 1,000 teenage hackers in the U.K alone. If we let them continue to shut down accounts, hack passwords and destroy the cyber world where will we be. Sign this petition to help persuade the government come up with some good ways in which these teenage hackers can put their skills to good uses.
